name: The Story Of Goodness: Paradoraniskawia [Early Access Version 1]
name_original: The Story Of Goodness: Paradoraniskawia [Early Access Version 1]
description:
This is the first early release test version and has online multiplayer. Using the same engine and Mechanics with Full game and it is benefit from the Main story. You can test the mechanics while creating a server or joining to a server and play together while testing mechanics of the game.

 We will support Multiplayer Early Accesses and Alpha versions until full game has finished.

If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to send a mail to our mail. 

If you use Discord, we will be glad to see you in our official server.

https://discord.com/invite/jFwqAwP
